title: Calling the shots: the advertising of alcohol
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol

description: Based on the research of Jean Kilbourne, media analyst, this film examines images used by advertisers to sell alcohol. This detailed analysis shows how some advertising attracts young people to drink, but also disguises issues like alcohol abuse Suitable for upper secondary level.
